text: @AndrewYang That's what happens when #BigPharma pushes for the #vaccine. Quarantine to increase stress, and deplete  vitamin D, incubators for the sick to make it worse, and no immune boosting education for the "herd's" immune health. You act surprised? #coronavirus @Abukar_Arman @va_shiva
